      • flowKlt

        public static <I extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<I>,D extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<D>> DenseOpticalFlow<I> flowKlt(PkltConfig configKlt,
                                                                                                                                  int radius,
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Class<I> inputType,
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Class<D> derivType)
        Compute optical flow using PyramidKltTracker.
        Type Parameters:
        I - Input image type.
        D - Derivative image type.
        Parameters:
        configKlt - Configuration for KLT. If null then default values are used.
        radius - Radius of square region.
        inputType - Type of input image.
        derivType - Type of derivative image. If null then default is used.
        Returns:
        DenseOpticalFlow
        See Also:
        DenseOpticalFlowKlt

                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Class<T> imageType)
        The original Horn-Schunck algorithm. Only good for very small motions.
        Parameters:

        imageType - Type of input gray scale image
